summary: This player home is a small underground keep below Dragonsreach in Whiterun.The entrance is outside of whiterun to avoid an extra loading screen.All the necessary amenities can be found inside,including storage,mannequins,a forge,a merchant and more.3 new spells are also included which you will have to find inside of the keep.read the long descript
descriptionHtml:
Situated on the exterior of whiterun,the keep is a spacious yet uncluttered player home.Their are 9 rooms (as well as 3 hidden ones!) including an entrance hall,bedroom,throne room,kitchen,basement/dungeon,display room,study,library and forge.
Features -
9 chests,19 mannequins,13 display cases,6 weapon racks,9 weapon plaques,9 different shrines,12 bookcases,a bed,cooking pot/spit,a merchant,a forge,alchemy and enchanting benches,its own herb and poison gardens that grows back after time,a dragon priest mask stand,4 practice chests that re lock from adept to master level and a natural underground bath/shower area
Their are 3 new conjuration spells to be found in the keep in a (not very) hidden mini dungeon.
author: iboomstickv2

files.name: WHITERUNKEEP2
files.changelogHtml:
added an underground poison garden and natural bath/shower room
added practice locks to train lockpicking
added more general items to give a more lived in feel to the keep
more aesthetics to make the place look cool
added a dragon priest mask altar and more
